GSD.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v4.19.267
GSD.description:
HID: hyperv: fix possible memory leak in mousevsc_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit a6d2fb1874c52ace1f5cf1966ee558829c5c19b6, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit 74c4fb058083b47571a4f76dcfce95085f2d8098. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: hyperv: fix possible memory leak in mousevsc_probe()
OSV.details:
